entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
